name: A black obi with crow netsuke
data: It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane focus'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'mark of zomm'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
